meanings.definition: A person who sells small items or trinkets.
meanings.sent1: The trinketers set up their stalls at the market every weekend.
meanings.sent2: I bought a lovely bracelet from one of the trinketers at the fair.
meanings.sent3: The trinketers joked with each other as they displayed their wares.
meanings.sent4: The trinketers were like magicians, pulling out treasures from their pockets.
meanings.sent5: The trinketers' colorful displays caught the eye of many passersby.

meanings.definition: A group of people who engage in the selling of small items or trinkets.
meanings.sent1: We could hear the chatter of the trinketers as we approached the market.
meanings.sent2: The trinketers worked together to attract customers to their booth.
meanings.sent3: The trinketers formed a lively community within the marketplace.
meanings.sent4: The trinketers' unity was their strength in the competitive market.
meanings.sent5: The trinketers' laughter filled the air as they shared stories of their sales.
